reviewText: Our kids ages 8 and under loved this movie.  It's entertaining and a great learning DVD.  My 6 year old son has been walking around the house spelling words he learned on this movie such as KITE.  Two thumbs up. Plus, you can't beat the price.  You won't regret buying this.  Check it out today!!!  We received a complimentary DVD in exchange for our honest review.

Not my favorite but my son still likes it. It is educational and entertaining at the same time. My toddler lovers Word World and has learned to spell many words with it. Of course for your child to get the max out of this program they should have a good foundation of letter recognition and associated sounds. It is awesome!

This DVD contains 4 episodes from the Wordworld cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Totally Terrific Duck
2. Kite Flight
3. Mmm... Mmm... Milk
4. Bugs to the Rescue

Love this show for my 2 year old son! He has learned so much from it! Would recommend it to anyone with very small children!! My son knew all the letters of the alphabet before he was 2 because of it!  Thanks Word World!!

My kids love this show and was getting sick of the same dvr'd episodes.  Bought this to get a little more variety and the kids enjoy watching.  My 4 year old learns a ton from watching and I can seeing him using the concepts to spell and read.
my daughter is 4months loves word world. As a teacher i use word world in my classes. One of the best!

My first grandson (5 yrs. old now) loved Word World.  When I tried to find it on PBS I was very upset to find out that it wasn't being run any more.  I wanted my second grandson to have the same experience with learning words.  Thanks to Amazon it was easy to find the DVDs and I am happy to say that Word World is having the same WONDERFUL impact on my second grandson.  They should put it back on the air.

My daughter is two years old and LOVES Word World. I love it too! It teaches her so much about words and gives a good little message for kindness and friends too. It is great and the price was worth the happiness she gets from watching this video over and over and over again!

My daughter ( 3 years) LOVES this dvd. We were recently given a complimentary copy of WordWorld : Picture Day, my daughter was given a selection of DVDs to choose from and she chose this one, even though we were unfamiliar with WordWorld. She was not disappointed! She loves the characters and I love the learning aspects of the dvd. It is perfect for her since she has been practicing her alphabet. The objects as words is such a cute and effective idea, and my daughter loves it. We will be expanding our WordWorld dvd collection!
We are word world fanatics over here!! My 3yr old loves all the characters and really has learned her alphabet from the help of mom and word world:) keep up the good work!!!
